Now you can enter the<1"�>

<17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}? If go

Yes! What is? Eh? Hey!<1"�>

if have "Darkness Lamp".<1"�>

Deepest part of
<17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message} protected<1"�>
by very strong guy, look
like knight.<1"�>

such guy...

Is <17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2D耀>{4, message} alright...
Went to <17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}<1"�>
to find son who entered
<17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message} and not<1"�>
come back. Cave very dark and
huge, if child there,<1"�>
easily gets lost.
But me heard, cave has hidden<1"�>
room, would be bad if child hid
there. Hopefully, can find hints<1"�>
where secret room is...
Will have to search whole<1"�>
place for it...

Is <17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2D耀>{4, message} alright...
What, he found son!<1"�>
Child is save and unhurt!
Oh, this is great. Thank you!<1"�>
Finally, now no need to
worry anymore!!

<17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2D耀>{4, message} and son are
now save and sound.<1"�>
I'm so much glad!!

In darkness, light is key.
Keep eye out for torches.<1"�>
Also, be prepared for long
adventure there.

It's so dark in there that I
can't see anything further<1"�>
ahead. Let's ask the dwarfs if
they can help us!
